item.title: Monster Hunter Wilds x Street Fighter 6 special collaboration announced
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/monster-hunter-wilds-x-street-fighter-6-special-collaboration-announced

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Due out on May 28.

Capcom has announced a Street Fighter 6 special collaboration for Monster Hunter Wilds. It will launch on May 28 in the form of a new side mission with exclusive rewards, and additional paid downloadable content.

Here are the details:

■ Street Fighter 6 Special Collaboration

A special collaboration with Capcom’s own fighting franchise Street Fighter 6 is now underway! Akuma—a demon of combat that has welcomed the Satsui no Hado into his being in his quest to become the ultimate master of the fist—makes his appearance in Monster Hunter Wilds! This collaboration has a host of fun new features that are sure to get you into the fighting spirit!

■ Content

Special collaboration-exclusive rewards have been added! Check out the exclusive special collaboration side mission to experience Akuma in action!

Claim special collaboration rewards by completing the new side mission Ultimate Strength, featuring Akuma! Complete the accompanying collab arena quests Demonic Strength and True Strength for additional rewards.

The side mission Ultimate Strength is available for hunters at HR 21 or higher. Talk to Quinn, the Vespae Unit handler, at the Oilwell Basin Base Camp to start the mission.

  • “Akuma” hunter full armor set and layered equipment.
  • “Blanka-Chan” Palico full armor set and layered equipment.
  • Hunter Profile background, nameplate, and pose.

Note: After its addition as a free update this collaboration will be a permanent addition to the game.

Unleash the Demon within!

You can unleash your inner demon by equipping the “Akuma” full armor set or full layered armor set. Equipping either set allows you to use Akuma’s unique item and gestures to perform his fighting moves!

Unleash Your Inner Akuma!

Experience the thrill of Street Fighter with the recreation of the Drive Impact, a system exclusive to Street Fighter 6, and more.

You can select Akuma’s actions from the Item Bar. Use the “Assisted Combo: Akuma” item command to branch out into various combo attacks and unleash special moves like Gou Hadoken and Gou Shoryuken.

  • The attack power of Akuma’s unique actions is determined by the main weapon you have equipped.
  • Equipping the full armor set boosts attack power considerably compared to using the full layered armor set, and Assisted Combos and other actions will gain stun properties while the Drive Impact action will gain an offset effect.

■ Paid Downloadable Content

Paid downloadable content will also be available from May 28, 2025 to further enhance the collaboration experience!

  • Alma Outfits
    • Chun-Li Outfit – SF6
    • Cammy Outfit – SF6
  • Pendant
    • Blanka-Chan Doll
  • Stickers
    • Street Fighter 6 Set
  • Gestures
    • Hadoken
    • Shoryuken
    • Tatsumaki Senpu-kyaku
    • Note: Gestures have attack properties.

Monster Hunter Wilds is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam.
